name: $::type
desc: Returns: This code identifies the type of the component.

name: $code
desc: Returns: A code that identifies the component. Codes may be used to differentiate between kinds of taxes, surcharges, discounts etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code that identifies the component. Codes may be used to differentiate between kinds of taxes, surcharges, discounts etc.

name: $factor
desc: Returns: The factor that has been applied on the base price for calculating this component.

pvardefs.name: pValue

name: $amount
desc: Returns: The amount calculated for this component.

pvardefs.name: pValue
